Title: The Burning
Writer: Harvey Weinstein (original story), Tony Maylam (original story), Brad Grey (original story), Peter Lawrence (screenplay), Bob Weinstein (screenplay), Harvey Weinstein (created by)
Actors: Brian Matthews, Leah Ayres, Brian Backer, Larry Joshua
Plot: A former summer camp caretaker, horribly burned from a prank gone wrong, lurks around an upstate New York summer camp bent on killing the teenagers responsible for his disfigurement.
